summary: Ahmed Zewail is an Egyptian chemist.
full_text: Ahmed Hassan Zewail  is an Egyptian scientist, known as the "father of femtochemistry", he won the 1999 Nobel Prize in Chemistry for his work on femtochemistry and became the first Egyptian scientist to win a Nobel Prize in a scientific field. He is the Linus Pauling Chair Professor of Chemistry, Professor of Physics, and the director of the Physical Biology Center for Ultrafast Science and Technology  at the California Institute of Technology.
title: Ahmed Zewail
